data.title: Cramer's Investing Club: AMD’s Lisa Su says chipmaker aimed at new markets, more supply
data.description: "In technology, it's all about making the right bets and the right decisions as to where technology is going," AMD's Lisa Su said Friday.

data.title: House competition bill aims to boost minorities in science and technology
data.description: The bill includes authorizing $900 million for grants and partnerships with historically Black colleges and universities.

data.title: Tesla recalls 817,000 vehicles in U.S. over seat belt reminder alert
data.description: Tesla Inc is recalling more than 817,000 vehicles in the United States because an audible alert may not activate when a vehicle starts and the driver has not buckled the seat belt, a U.S. auto safety regulator said.

data.title: This NFT tells the origin story of technology. Here's where you can get it
This Dubai restaurant is using tech to stop seafood fraud
data.description: Fraudulent mislabeling of seafood is a widespread problem, but technology can help bring transparency to the seafood industry. In Dubai, beachfront restaurant Rockfish has partnered with online marketplace Seafood Souq to make sure their offerings are traceable and sustainable.

data.title: China names blockchain trial zones after its crackdown on cryptocurrencies
data.description: In 2019, President Xi Jinping called on China to "seize the opportunities" presented by blockchain, giving his personal backing to the technology.
